div.p:
Please be advised that the Governor has extended the "Safer at Home" order through May 26, 2020. In addition to this recent order, all schools will be closed through the conclusion of the current academic year. This is not the news that we wanted to hear, but will plan accordingly in light of this determination. District staff will be meeting to plan for this recent news and once plans are developed you can expect communications to you for your planning purposes. Principals will be speaking with their staff members to make appropriate plans for the continuation of learning opportunities to the extent possible. We ask your patience in taking the time necessary to process this new information and the impact that it has on your child(ren) and your family. There will certainly be more information to follow. Dr. Steven M. Bloom, District Administrator
Palmyra-Eagle Area School District
